column4: does anyone know where i can get a full debian package for xmms
one that will install to my apllications menu
Have you tried System -> Preferences -> Main Menu to see if your installed programmed are there, but simply unchecked?
look for a package in Synaptic similar to ntfstools - it will allow you to do all sorts of crazy things like resizing NTFS partitions - just be careful! backup your data beforehand just in case
